DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy WC3011 placebo vaginal gel postmenopausal woman relief vaginal dryness cause vaginal atrophy measure self-assessment , vaginal pH vaginal smear .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy WC3011 Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Moderate severe vaginal dryness Postmenopausal meet one following : 12 month spontaneous amenorrhea , 6 month spontaneous amenorrhea serum FSH ( follicle stimulate hormone ) > 40 mIU ( milliInternational Unit ) /mL , 6 week postsurgical bilateral oophorectomy confirm surgical report , ultrasound serum FSH > 40 mIU/mL , 6 week postsurgical hysterectomy ovary failure confirm serum FSH > 40 mIU/mL Age ≥ 40 year bilateral oophorectomy ≥ 35 year Normal breast exam ; > 40 year , documentation negative mammogram Randomization PR04409 , participation clinical trial use investigational drug within 30 day prior screen Smokes ≥ 15 cigarettes/day Known suspect premalignant malignant disease Cardiovascular disease , insulindependent diabetes mellitus , congestive heart failure , stroke ischemic attack , thrombophlebitis thromboembolic disorder Increased frequency/severity headache estrogen therapy Drug addiction/alcohol abuse within last 2 year Currently take St. John 's Wort anticoagulant Uncontrolled hypertension thyroid disorder , clinically significant depression untreated urinary tract infection
